Song.title: Fill Us With Your Spirit, Lord

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Em l Em l Em l Em l]
VERSE 1: [Em]O Lord we know you are [Cmaj7]sovereign Earth and [D]heaven move at your com[C2]mand [Em]And though the nations opp[Cmaj7]ose you You will acc[D]omplish ev’rything you’ve [Asus]planned [C]All those who plot to dethr[D]one you find That their [G]strategies are [D/F#]all in [Em]vain [C]Before your throne they will b[D]end their knees And con[Am7]fess that Jesus surely reig[B7]ns
CHORUS 1: [G]Fill us with your Sp[D]irit, Lord To b[Bm7]oldly speak your w[Em]ord [G]Open unbel[D]ieving ears And [Bm7]let your voice be h[Em]eard
VERSE 2: [Em]Lord, we’re aware of our [Cmaj7]weakness And we’re [D]tempted to shrink back in [C2]fear [Em]From threat of hostile re[Cmaj7]jection Or ridi[D]cule of what we hold so [Asus]dear [C]Lord, grant us boldness to s[D]peak the truth That sal[G]vation is in [D/F#]Jesus’ [Em]name The [C]cross may look foolish to[D] the world But we [Am7]do not want to be ash[B7]amed
{new_page}
CHORUS 2: [G]Fill us with your S[D]pirit, Lord Ex[Bm7]tend your hand to [Em]heal [G]In the name of [D]Jesus show Your [Bm7]pow’rful grace is [Em]real
Verse 3: [Em]O Lord, we know that the [Cmaj7]hour has come When the [D]dead will hear your [C2]voice And [Em]those who are in their [Cmaj7]graves shall rise And to[D]gether will re[Asus]joice [C]They will rejoice as they [D]finally see The [G]day that death it[D/F#]self has [Em]died [C]They will rejoice as they [D]finally see The [Am7]Resurrection and the [B7]Life
Chorus: [G]Fill us with your S[D]pirit, Lord Em[Bm7]power us to [Em]give [G]Words of life to [D]all, O Lord And [Bm7]cause the dead to [Em]live
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 o lord we know you are sovereign earth and heaven move at your command and though the nations oppose you you will accomplish evrything youve planned all those who plot to dethrone you find that their strategies are all in vain before your throne they will bend their knees and confess that jesus surely reigns chorus 1 fill us with your spirit lord to boldly speak your word open unbelieving ears and let your voice be heard verse 2 lord were aware of our weakness and were tempted to shrink back in fear from threat of hostile rejection or ridicule of what we hold so dear lord grant us boldness to speak the truth that salvation is in jesus name the cross may look foolish to the world but we do not want to be ashamed chorus 2 fill us with your spirit lord extend your hand to heal in the name of jesus show your powrful grace is real verse 3 o lord we know that the hour has come when the dead will hear your voice and those who are in their graves shall rise and together will rejoice they will rejoice as they finally see the day that death itself has died they will rejoice as they finally see the resurrection and the life chorus fill us with your spirit lord empower us to give words of life to all o lord and cause the dead to live
